section.title: Description
section.p: The external data object to be linked to the selected document e.g. a path to a fileserver, and a filename for the object (VA1$:[IMAGES]JR042696.BMP, or i:\images\jr042696.bmp), etc.

stentry.p: The path to a fileserver, and a filename for the object (VA1$:[IMAGES]JR042696.BMP, or i:\images\jr042696.bmp), etc.
